creator: GEORGE CHANIOTAKIS
title: High Voltage Die!
materials_required: Die Tool (likely a high voltage power supply or transformer)
description: This project demonstrates a homemade Kirlian photography device used to capture electrical discharges using a "Glass box with water". The method involves registering electrical discharges to create high voltage photos and videos.
steps: The process involves using a Die Tool and a glass box filled with water.
Electrical discharges are registered using this setup.
The electrical discharges are then used to take high voltage photos and videos.
